welcome_message_body: Welcome to Laval, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its vibrant cultural scene, stunning parks, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Laval has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cap Horn
restaurants.description: Cap Horn is a café located in Laval.
restaurants.address: 1 Rue de la Paix (Quai Béatrix de Gavre), 53000 Laval

restaurants.name: Le Relais d'Alsace
restaurants.description: Le Relais d'Alsace is a alsatian restaurant located in Laval.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Laval.
restaurants.address: 6 Rue Du Val de Mayenne, 53000 Laval

restaurants.name: La Boucherie
restaurants.description: La Boucherie is a steakhouse located in Laval.

restaurants.name: La Boite à Pizza
restaurants.description: La Boite à Pizza is a pizzeria located in Laval.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves US-bound flights and is connected to the US Customs and Border Protection facility.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
